topics.body:
I just thought of something funny; next time someone logs in for the morning or they are popping in real quick or such that isn't one of the people here just come up with the most random fake discussion ever and use a bunch of fake replies that don't actually go to any posts so that the person gets nervous and starts trying to find the posts that everyone is talking about and make a really heated discussion without any description of what is going on so that they get nervous wondering why everyone's freaking out.

So like:
person, "Good morning everyone!"
poster in on it, "Well fuck you <insert user here> there is no way that was any good and you're a terrible person for thinking that was any good"
other poster in on it, "Fuck you too!  I think it was amazing!  Hey <addressing person who just logged on> what do you think about the discussion?  Am I right or what?"
